question: What is the name of the leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia?
asked_question_translated: What is the name of the leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia?
answer: The leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia is the Regional Development Agency (RDA) of the Drava Plain.
answer_translated_eng: The leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia is the Regional Development Agency (RDA) of the Drava Plain.
